CHAT.comment: DALE G. BECKER, Petitioner v. BETTY MONTGOMERY, ATTORNEY GENERAL OF OHIO, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY S. SUTTON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEWART A. BAKER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JEFFREY S. SUTTON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 10:56 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
